MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar. This is causing flickering power and low voltage to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.39am. Our engineers are on site to investigate the low voltage issue and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.37am on the 4th of February 2021.
